quotes.quote: A cat has absolute emotional honesty: human beings, for one reason or another, may hide their feelings, but a cat does not.
A cat's idea of a 'good time' is to kill something.
The cat does not offer services. The cat offers itself. Of course he wants care and shelter. You don't buy love for nothing.
A little drowsing cat is an image of perfect beatitude.
No cat out of its first fur can ever be deceived by appearances. Unlike human beings, who enjoy them.
A well-trained cat doesn't exist because a cat remains a cat.
The cat is cryptic, and close to strange things which men cannot see.
Any cat that misses a mouse pretends it was aiming for the dead leaf.
A cat understands how to be pleasant in the morning. He doesn't talk.
God made the cat to give man the pleasure of stroking a tiger
A cat cares for you only as a source of food, security and a place in the sun.
If you hold a cat by the tail you learn things you cannot learn any other way.
The cat has complete emotional honesty – an attribute not often found in humans.
The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
If you are worthy of its affection, a cat will be your friend but never your slave.
The cat is, above all things, a dramatist.
A cat is a puzzle for which there is no solution.
In a cat's eye, all things belong to cats.
The cat always leaves a mark on his friend.
A cat will never drown if she sees the shore.
Every cat knows some things need to be buried.
A cat is a cat. She has no race creed or collar.
No cat purrs unless someone is around to listen.
A cat is only technically an animal, being divine.
Cat angels are the reason there are no mice angels.
A cat doesn't linger over making it's desires felt.
Wherever a cat sits, there shall happiness be found.
If a woman has one cat, it will invariably turn into 20.
A cat is never a presentation, but an innocent happening.
Every cat is really the most beautiful woman in the room.
The cat is a wild animal that inhabits the homes of humans.
Cat's eyes seem a bridge to a world beyond the one we know.
The cat dwells within the circle of her own secret thoughts.
Black cat or white cat: If it can catch mice, it's a good cat.
A cat can never be well-trained because they're too independent.
The only true animal is a cat, and the only true cat is a gray cat.
A cat has to be in a very bad mood if a human cannot coax him to purr.
The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath.
A cat improves the garden wall in sunshine, and the hearth in foul weather.
A cat pours his body on the floor like water. It is restful just to see him.
A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
The main difference between a cat and a lie is that a cat only has nine lives.
The cat makes himself the companion of your hours of solitude, melancholy and toil.
Each cat has a distinct purrsonality.
Cat lovers know that every cat is remarkable.
The cat would eat fish but would not get her feet wet.
The best model of a cat is another cat..., specially the same cat.
